subtests.name: Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / should fail when the mapping is to an empty array
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Exact vs. prefix based matching / should match correctly when both are in the map
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Exact vs. prefix based matching / should match correctly when only an exact match is in the map
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Exact vs. prefix based matching / should match correctly when only a prefix match is in the map
